name: HEX MMO Trading Card Game
blurb: From the creators of the World of Warcraft Trading Card Game, HEX is a TCG / MMO that combines the best of both for your PC & MAC

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER TIER\r\n==============================\r\nHEX MMO TCG beta invite as a special thank you for contributing.

SQUIRE TIER ============================== 
2 Starter Decks (your choice) (20.00 value).
10 Booster Packs (20.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Card: Lady Cassandra.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

WARRIOR TIER ============================== 
3 Starter Decks (your choice) (30.00 value).
25 Booster Packs (50.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP card: Replicator’s Gambit.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champion: Zoltog. Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra and Void Marauder.
Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

CAPTAIN TIER ============================== 
4 Starter Decks (40.00 value).
40 Booster Packs (80.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP cards: Replicator’s Gambit and Princess Victoria. Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champions: Zoltog and Burgamot Ebonrock. 
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra, Void Marauder and Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter. Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior and Captain.
Digital Art Book “The Art of HEX” PDF format.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

KNIGHT TIER ==============================  
4 Starter Decks (40.00 value).
60 Booster Packs (120.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP cards: Replicator’s Gambit, Princess Victoria and Extinction.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champions: Zoltog, Burgamot Ebonrock and Mooof.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra, Void Marauder, Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter and Scourge Knight.
Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior, Captain and Knight.
Digital Art Book “The Art of HEX” PDF format.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

CHAMPION TIER:
============================== 
4 Starter Decks (40.00 value).
85 Booster Packs (170.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP cards: Replicator’s Gambit, Princess Victoria, Extinction and Ragefire.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champions: Zoltog, Burgamot Ebonrock, Mooof and Mephistophelius.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra, Void Marauder, Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter, Scourge Knight and The Wrath of Zakiir.
Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior, Captain, Knight and Champion.
Digital Art Book “The Art of HEX” PDF format.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: THE KING TIER ========================== \r\n 4 Starter Decks (40.00 value). 150 Booster Packs (300.00 value). Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP cards: Replicator\u2019s Gambit, Princess Victoria, Extinction, Ragefire and Pack Raptor. Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champions: Zoltog, Burgamot Ebonrock, Mooof, Mephistophelius and Monkey of the Nine Tails. Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra, Void Marauder, Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter, Scourge Knight, The Wrath of Zakiir and Spectral Lotus Garden. Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior, Captain, Knight, Champion and King. Digital Art Book \u201cThe Art of HEX\u201d PDF format. Name in the credits as Kickstarter Backer. HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

KING TIER: 
============================== 
4 Starter Decks (40.00 value).
150 Booster Packs (300.00 value).
Kickstarter Exclusive Alternate Art PVP cards: Replicator’s Gambit, Princess Victoria, Extinction, Ragefire and Pack Raptor.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Champions: Zoltog, Burgamot Ebonrock, Mooof, Mephistophelius and Monkey of the Nine Tails.
Kickstarter Exclusive PVE Cards: Lady Cassandra, Void Marauder, Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter, Scourge Knight, The Wrath of Zakiir and Spectral Lotus Garden.
Kickstarter Exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves: Warrior, Captain, Knight, Champion and King.
Digital Art Book “The Art of HEX” PDF format.
Name in the credits as Kickstarter Backer.
HEX MMO TCG beta invite.

THE COLLECTOR TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the King tier.
6 NEW Alternate Art PVP cards per year, exclusive to “the Collector” Tier for life of the game.
“The Collector” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
A second set of all exclusive cards from the King level.

THE RAID LEADER TIER:
============================== 
Everything from the King tier. 
+1 Card in the opening hand of all players grouped with “The Raid Leader” in non-tournament PVE content FOR LIFE of the game!
“The Raid Leader” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Raid Leader- exclusive PVE card.

THE DUNGEON CRAWLER TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the King tier.
+100% extra loot drop (gold, items, etc.) from dungeon bosses FOR LIFE of the game!
“The Dungeon Crawler” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
20 random Rare / Legendary pieces of Equipment for you to get started.

THE GUILD MASTER TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the King tier.
+10% PVE experience for all members of the “The Guild Masters” guild FOR LIFE of the game!
“The Guild Master” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Special Guild Code: give 30 booster packs each to 3 of your friends (180.00 value).

THE PRO PLAYER TIER: \r\n============================== \r\nEverything from the King tier. One free draft tournament each week FOR LIFE of the game! \u201cThe Pro Player\u201d exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves. Kickstarter exclusive tournament for the Pro Player tier (this reward may happen after Sep 2013). Grand Prize for the tournament: 4 of every card at release.

THE GRAND KING TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the King, The Pro Player, The Guild Master, The Dungeon Crawler, The Raid Leader, and The Collector tiers (King tier is included only once--not six times).
“The Grand King” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.

THE DRAGON LORD TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from The Grand King tier. One of every non-exclusive card in the game at release. “The Dragon Lord” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Vanity Card: work with Cryptozoic’s art department to get your likeness on a card.

PRIMAL TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the The Grand King tier.
4 of every non-exclusive card in the game at release.
“Primal” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Vanity Card: work with Cryptozoic’s art staff to get your likeness on a card.
Design your own sleeves: work with Cryptozoic art department to design your unique Deck Customizable Sleeves.

IMMORTAL TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the The Grand King tier. 
4 of every non-exclusive card in the game and all equipment at release.
“Immortal” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Vanity Card: work with Cryptozoic’s art staff to get your likeness on a card.
Design your own sleeves: work with Cryptozoic art department to design your unique Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Choose the theme of an upcoming dungeon adventure; work with Cryptozoic writing department to concept a HEX dungeon.

THE PRODUCER TIER: 
============================== 
Everything from the The Grand King tier.
4 of every non-exclusive card in the game and all equipment for life.
“Producer” exclusive Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Name in the credits as an Executive Producer.
Vanity Card: work with Cryptozoic’s art staff to get your likeness on a card.
Design your own sleeves: work with Cryptozoic art department to design your unique Deck Customizable Sleeves.
Choose the theme of an upcoming dungeon adventure; work with Cryptozoic writing department to concept a HEX dungeon.
Design a Card! Come to Cryptozoic and work with our game designers to create your own card, and then work with our art staff to decide how it looks
(You are responsible for travel to and from Cryptozoic)
